Question
========

Below is a partially completed ANOVA table, belonging to a Completely Randomized Design (Oneway) ANOVA.

  --------------------- ---- ---- ---- --- Source of variation SS df MS F Between groups 27 3 Within groups 24 12 --------------------- ---- ---- ---- ---

The critical value from the F table (when tested at 5% risk) applicable here is equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 3.49
* 3.98
* 5.95
* 8.74

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 3.49: Correct
* 3.98: Incorrect
* 5.95: Incorrect
* 8.74: Incorrect
